1_q: "Be mindful of the living Force, young Padawan."
3_q: "Rejoice for those around you who transform into the Force."
4_q: "Vader was seduced by the dark side of the Force."
5_q: "There is a great disturbance in the Force."
6_q: "Only together can we turn him to the dark side of the Force."

1_q: "Don't worry. The Force will guide us."
2_q: "Remember, Obi-Wan, if the prophecy is true, your apprentice is the only one who can bring the Force back into balance."
3_q: "May the Force be with us all."
4_q: "The Force?"
6_q: "Strong am I with the Force, but not that strong."

2_q: "Anakin, may the Force be with you."
3_q: "Is he not to destroy the Sith and bring balance to the Force?"
4_q: "The Force is what gives a Jedi his power. It's an energy field created by all living things. It surrounds us and penetrates us. It binds the galaxy together."
5_q: "Yes! A Jedi's strength flows from the Force."
6_q: "Twilight is upon me, and soon night must fall. That is the way of things, the way of the Force."

1_q: "I sense a disturbance in the Force."
2_q: "May the Force be with you, Master."
3_q: "Darth Plagueis was a dark lord of the Sith so powerful and so wise, he could use the Force to influence the midi-chlorians to create life."
4_q: "You must learn the ways of the Force if you're to come with me to Alderaan."
5_q: "Anger, fear, aggression; the dark side of the Force are they, easily they flow, quick to join you in a fight."
6_q: "Remember, a Jedi's strength flows from the Force."

1_q: "The Force is unusually strong with him."
3_q: "The dark side of the Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural."
4_q: "Learn about the Force, Luke."
5_q: "A Jedi uses the Force for knowledge and defense, never for attack."
6_q: "Luke, the Force runs strong in your family. Pass on what you have learned."

2_q: "I think it is time we informed the senate that our ability to use the Force has diminished."
3_q: "Obi-Wan. May the Force be with you."
4_q: "The ability to destroy a planet is insignificant next to the power of the Force."
5_q: "That place is strong with the dark side of the Force."
6_q: "Your father was seduced by the dark side of the Force."

2_q: "The dark side of the Force has clouded their vision, my friend."
3_q: "Goodbye, old friend. May the Force be with you."
4_q: "I want to learn the ways of the Force and become a Jedi like my father."
6_q: "When I first knew him, your father was already a great pilot, but I was amazed how strongly the Force was with him. I took it about myself to train him as a Jedi."

1_q: "I have encountered a vergence in the Force."
2_q: "It is obvious that this contest cannot be decided by our knowledge of the Force, but by our skills with a lightsaber."
3_q: "The dark side of the Force surrounds the chancellor."
4_q: "The Force can have a strong influence on the weak-minded."
5_q: "Judge me by my size, do you? Hmm? Hmm. And well you should not, for my ally is the Force."
6_q: "The Force is strong in my family. My father has it. I have it. And my sister has it."

1_q: "You refer to the prophecy of the one who will bring balance to the Force."
2_q: "The Force is with us, Master Sidious."
3_q: "I know there are things about the Force that they're not telling me."
4_q: "Remember, a Jedi can feel the Force flowing through him."
5_q: "You must feel the Force around you."
6_q: "The emperor will show you the true nature of the Force. He is your master now."

1_q: "Finding him was the will of the Force."
3_q: "Let me help you to know the subtleties of the Force."
4_q: "You don't believe in the Force, do you?"

3_q: "How do you know the ways of the Force?"
4_q: "The Force will be with you... always."
5_q: "Through the Force, things you will see. Other places. The future. The past. Old friends long gone."

1_q: "He is headstrong, and he has much to learn of the living Force, but he is capable."
3_q: "My mentor taught me everything about the Force."
4_q: "A tremor in the Force. The last time I felt it was in the presence of my old master."
5_q: "But I can help them. I feel the Force."

3_q: "If you wish to become a complete and wise leader, you must embrace a larger view of the Force."
4_q: "Don't underestimate the Force."
5_q: "This is a dangerous time for you, when you will be tempted by the dark side of the Force."

1_q: "Without the midi-chlorians, life could not exist, and we would have no knowledge of the Force."
3_q: "Learn to know the dark side of the Force, and you will be able to save your wife from certain death."
4_q: "Obi-Wan is here. The Force is with him."
5_q: "Only a fully trained Jedi knight, with the Force as his ally, will conquer Vader and his emperor."

1_q: "They continually speak to us, telling us the will of the Force."
3_q: "He knows the ways of the Force."
4_q: "Then man your ships, and may the Force be with you."
5_q: "The Force is with you, young Skywalker. But you are not a Jedi yet."

3_q: "Learn to use the dark side of the Force."
4_q: "May the Force be with you."

3_q: "The Force is strong with you. A powerful Sith you will become."
4_q: "Luke, the Force will be with you."

3_q: "Faith in your new apprentice misplaced may be. As is your faith in the dark side of the Force."
4_q: "Use the Force, Luke."

3_q: "It was said that you would destroy the Sith, not join them! Bring balance to the Force, not leave it in darkness!"
4_q: "The Force is strong with this one."

3_q: "An old friend has learned the path to immortality. One who has returned from the netherworld of the Force."
4_q: "Remember, the Force will be with you always."
